name: Chelle Ramey
text: Absolutely amazing!!! I am so happy we found Dr. Beers. She has the best customer service, best prices, and so easy to speak with. She actually "listens" and doesn't try to up-sell anything. Dr. Beers is so genuine and loves what she does....you can tell. Thank you Dr. Beers, and welcome to our zoo - hahahahaha.

name: karyn stalcup
text: Dr Beers is outstanding, affordable, and understands your pet. We have a Rottweiler that my pervious vet was uncomfortable treating. That vet actual recommended Dr Beers. So glad because she has been excellent dealing with my often naughty Rottweiler. Give her a try. They come to your home and I find their rates better than most brick and mortar vets.

name: Anna Felts
text: Using On the Spot Vet Care is a great way to keep your pet happy and healthy! Dr. Beers and her mobile unit provide a comfortable place to handle pets and offer the very best medical care. She's able to take away some of your pet's stress by coming to the comfort of your home! If traveling to the vet is hectic for you or your pet, On the Spot is the way to go!

name: AnMarie Lane
text: Love Dr. Beers and her staff! They are kind, knowledgeable, affordable, and best of all convenient. No long car rides to the vet means less stress and happier pets! Definitely recommend this vet!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Edith Hohler
text: Dr. Beers and her team are truly ROCK STARS!  Dr. Beers truly cares about what she does and is always available to help.  It's nice to know that my pets are taken care of by and amazing team; they are like family!

resp.text: Thanks for trusting us with the care of Marley and Hamilton!!

name: Nicole Bowden
text: We love Dr. Beers! She is great with our fur babies. She actually saved our Boxer from having her leg amputated because of a misdiagnosis from another vet. It’s so convenient having her come to our house and you can’t beat her prices. Dr. Beers really cares about our dogs just like they were her own.

name: Jared Vann Chapman
text: Doctor Beers is a great veterinarian, caring and always helpful! Its such a convenience to have someone who will come to you for most all your pet health needs!

name: Robert Beeler
text: Dr Beers and her tech were efficient, respectful, and provided quality care for my cats...all at a reasonable price.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: matthew fountain
text: I have been trying to leave this review for a week, can’t find the words, I’m speechless 😶. All I can say is that On the spot Vet Care does a awesome job and you can tell that they have your pets best interest at all times. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. You don’t have to count them, that’s 10 stars.

name: Jessica Rabren
text: Dr. Beers with On the Spot Vet Care is the best. She has gone above and beyond for my animals and I can’t imagine using anyone but her. She sends reminders when my dogs or cats are due for any sort of shots or medicine refills. If something is off, she figures out the problem. Not only does she care for my own animals, she cares for homeless animals and does a lot of spay and neuter work in the community, which I love. Give this veterinarian a try!  It’s worth it!!!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!!  We always love seeing you and your fur kids!

name: John Terry
text: An attentive, caring veterinarian with unbeatable prices. I won't let any other vet touch my dogs.

name: Alabama Jenny
text: Change your services online. It’s misleading. No longer taking appointments for home care!

name: Shari Kellogg
text: We have 8 cats so when it’s time for rabies vaccine etc this was a life saver!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us to care for your fur babies!!

name: Jenny Vance
text: Dr. Beers cares about your pets and comes to you!

resp.text:
Thank you for the review!! I hope Chickory has recovered from her recent “doggie cold”
❤️❤️

name: Jennifer Riley
text: Awesome folks

name: Chris Helms
text: The grooming staff here is great and I would love to continue using them but the front desk staff that worked with my wife today, the way that she was spoken with, and the way that they constantly push vaccinations that our family vet doesn't require or promote is more than we can deal with. It's a shame because the facility is nice and the groomer is fantastic.

resp.text: Mr. Helms, I am sorry to hear your experience did not meet your expectations with Aubie’s visit today. We strive to provide excellence in pet care and customer service and take every concern and issue seriously. I have looked into what happened with Aubie’s visit today and left a voicemail for your wife. Please call me at 205-406-6794 so we can further discuss your experience in more detail. Thank you. -Brittany Rice, Practice Manager

name: Melody McCaa
text: The grooming staff is very nice and always does a great job with my husky, even through her term per tantrums. Had a mild procedure done here as well and my pup recovered in no time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Melody! We love when Morrow comes to visit us and appreciate you trusting us to care for her.

name: Della Fuller
text: I had to ask repeatedly to see the boarding kennels that my pet was staying in. Every prior visit was under Covid restrictions, and no one was allowed in the building. Finally a tech allowed me to look thru a window. I had to ask for my blanket when picking up one of my pets, and my leftover food was not returned back to me. The charges were ridiculously high.

name: Susan Grace
text: All staff I encountered were so helpful and friendly. This is definitely my boarding choice when I attend the annual AKO reunion in Opelika. I know my sweet dog receives lots of TLC including the turn down service for which I gladly pay a little extra.

name: Fern Compton
text: Very helpful, specially how many times we had to cancel dates because our move dates kept changing. We appreciate your ability to help us. The animals came back happy and healthy. Thank you.

name: Shawna Bell
text: We were referred to Goodwin when we began to look for another  Veterinarian to work with our rescue, The Shire Rescue & Sanctuary, Inc. We are beyond pleased and blessed to have found such an awesome clinic. Dr. Faqua and the staff are amazing. I know that our seniors will be well taken care of here. I highly recommend other rescues to add them to their network of Vet services. You will not be disappointed!

name: Capricia Devoe
text: Our Pekingese is the first dog in our family and let me say Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been heaven sent.. all of my questions that I feel like I should know they reassure me and keep our baby in tip top shape!! My first experience in boarding they sent me pictures and updates daily.. I couldn’t ask for a better vet because they make us feel like family!!

name: Gayle Oden
text: My dog loves the Day Care. The staff is friendly. We also use the vet's there who are very caring and helpful in taking care of my baby.

name: Amy Jones
text: My fur baby loves going to their doggie daycare! They post pictures every day so you can see you dog in action too. He’s always so exhausted on the car ride home and is always excited to go again the next morning. It’s fairly priced and the staff is so nice. I would highly recommend them!

name: Erika Poikey
text: I've recently switched vet offices and now I'm SO HAPPY with my choice! Awesome service, on time, very consistent and explained everything to be very well. Highly recommend!

name: Rett McGowin
text: Dr. Katie, and Ashley, and the receptionist were awesome! Kudos to all!

name: Kristina Stephens
text: The staff is always so friendly and helpful. I travel a hour just to keep my dog with familiar faces who know his issues and take special care of him.

name: Linda Fuqua
text: Great professional staff and a very clean environment !

name: Mike Bradley
text:
Update June 2021. I am still happy with staff however I would definitely compare prices when it comes to over the counter meds.  I could of saved $60.00 by going with Amazon. Dasuquin $33.02 on Amazon,  $94.00 at Goodwin.
I find the staff polite and professional.  The staff truly seems to care about my dog.  I would,  however,  be pleased to see a report on how my dog faired during his boarding.  Did he eat? How did he interact with others?  For the money I spend on boarding a report would be appreciated.  Thank you.

name: Kris Lynch
text:
I can’t even begin to thank this Hospital enough.
We came in as an emergency while traveling for work.
Dr. FIelds met us in the lobby, and immediately made us feel at ease.
From the front desk staff, to the techs, to the Dr, everyone was so so nice !!
After an initial exam and xrays, we received the diagnosis of a torn ACL.
Dr Fields took the time to explain all of our options.
We scheduled her surgery the following Friday 7/5/2019
We drove 5 hours back to this hospital for her surgery !!
We dropped her off, I cried , they reassured me, and we left her in their capable hands .
Stephanie called me immediately following her surgery with an update and we returned the next morning to pick her up.
I’m so completely impressed with this hospital !!!
We will return with the rest of our pack, if the need should arise !!

name: Gayle Cowan
text: Hobo had a wonderful stay. Plenty of love and attention. Thank you! We will be back

name: Dominque Torres
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been our vet family since 2015.  We have always appreciated the sincere kindness and professionalism of the staff, amazing medical care and outstanding facilities.  Most recently my two French Bulldogs were scheduled for grooming and at the last minute I asked if they could get their annual exams completed and stay overnight.  Aliyah was wonderful with arranging our boarding accommodations and scheduling exams and documenting information in their records.  I received two calls from physicians, one after their initial exam and she thoroughly explained everything to me and offered to complete dental cleanings for them.  She was able to get them scheduled and completed as soon as possible.  Additionally, they now offer a turn down service where my babies were provided a walk and cuddles in the middle of the night.  With service like this, I am completely at ease leaving my babies with the Goodwin family.  Thank you so much for the amazing job you did.  I genuinely appreciate it.  Sincerely, Dominque Torres, Mom of Weezy and Lu Lu

name: bill crowder
text: the people that work there make this a great place   we have been so happy with them    our 16 week old lab loves to go there     i would recommend Goodwin Animal to anyone

name: Tori W
text: Originally we took our pup to a different vet bc they also boarded. Recently I took a tour after hearing several positive comments about Goodwin & I was blown away! Zoe did my tour & was fantastic. She answered all my questions & concerns. I immediately booked my dogs next boarding reservation here. They have an indoor salt pool, which is also is solar heated in the winter months! That's right, check out my pics, you can see the doggie hotels from the lobby. They also have separate entrances for dogs & cats. The back play area has astroturf so you don't have to worry about allergies.

name: Tiffany Williams
text: The staff was very helpful and pleasant and assisted me with getting my pup all squared away for his stay!!!

name: Shannah Bonner
text: Always great service! My pet gets the best care at Goodwin, which is why I keep going back.

name: Brittani Franklin
text: Everyone here is so wonderful. Have yet to have a bad experience ❤️

name: Peggy Haveard
text: Our pets had a wonderful stay!! The staff is always caring and professional.

name: Ronnie Poole
text: Very good experience the veterinarian was very professional and answered all of our questions.

name: Karin Hager
text: Our dogs absolutely love going here for boarding and even general vet visits!

name: Leila Cockerel
text: We just recently moved to Alabama and we already love Goodwin Animal Hospital.  Dr Fields is an intelligent and caring Veterinarian.  Also, his team was extremely helpful and friendly.  They took such great care of my dog and while we were there, they were able to get my dog's yearly vaccinations and examination.  Thank you Dr. Fields for being so nice, helpful, and flexible during our first visit.  Highly recommended.

name: Lance Neven
text: I keep asking my dog how it went, but she’s not talking right now.

name: Janice Norman
text: I am always pleased with the care my pet gets. The staff "goes the extra mile" to make my pet feel loved and comfortable. I cannot imagine leaving my pet any other place.

name: Sky G
text:
Absolutely, hands down, the BEST veterinary staff on the planet.

I will drive from 4 states away to keep coming back here.

name: Nina P
text: The whole team is amazing!  Super friendly, warm, and courteous.  They put my mind at ease every time I board my pup there.  Any issues that may arise, they let me know immediately.  Thank you!!

name: Brittany Graves
text: Great service and friendly staff.

name: Dawn McCoy
text: I had an emergency call with my cat late at night. And they still took him in. They are so nice and professional with him. I am glad they were honest when they could not find out what was wrong with him. But Dr. Kallam was so determined to help him she figured out the probably cause. Im following her instructions and he is all ready improving. Definitely bringing my baby's back to her.

name: Chris Bennett
text: Everyone is very friendly and helpful.  Never had a bad experience.

name: Kay Ware
text: Dr. Fuqua is the best veterinarian.  So compassionate. Our dog Banjo has loved her from day 1. Just like M.D’s, not all veterinarians are alike. When you find a great one, stick with them. We love Dr. Fuqua. Wish we could take her with us to Louisiana. I highly recommend her and this clinic.

name: Andrew Moulton
text: Everyone is always so kind and helpful. They treat my animals like they would their own, and genuinely care. I wont go anywhere else.

name: Stephanie Enloe
text: We love Goodwin Pet Resort for boarding our dog. He is always happy to be dropped off and the staff are incredibly sweet to us and to the pup. Our puppy always leaves with a wagging tail, well fed and hydrated, and overall happy! We would highly recommend them for boarding!

name: Jim Sheppard
text:
Had to make an after hours visit to clinic on Saturday for our aging cat, Missy.  Both Dr. Rigsby and the tech Ashley, were personable, helpful and very kind to Missy.  We spent waaay too much money, but felt it worth the cost to get Missy some relief from her ailment.  We have used the Goodwin clinic on Atlanta Highway for several years and have never failed to get excellent, caring service.

Have recommended you to several friends over the years and will continue.

name: Susie Pang
text: My two pups love it there!

name: Lisa Steadman
text: Everyone was amazing from the time we walked in.  This was our first visit as we are new to area.  Dr. Fields was great as well as his assistant (I cannot remember her name).  What an amazing practice!

name: Marie Mcgarry
text: Great place and it's nice and clean, great people/staff and they sure do care about your furr babies did not expect for a follow up call to check on our Little "Tank".  First visit and I'm glad i choose the right place, always check for a google reviews. Highly recommend it to everyone, you won't be disappointed on your first visit, Trust me.

name: bridgette jarry
text:
I really love taking My Maltese Lucky here.
They are really nice and take really good care of my pet.

name: Marina Ford
text: Dr. Jane Snead was awesome in an online consultation (my girl had an abscess, she's all good now). Thank you.

name: Jeffrey Jernigan
text: The vet is the sweetest the technician was great and all around good place to take your fur babies.

name: Dani's Do's and Don'ts
text: Dr. Fields and all the staff are great. They explained EVERYTHING in detail about my puppies surgery. Vanessa was on-call over the weekend. She answered numerous calls from me. Dr. Fields is personable, professional and seemed to genuinely care about for my pet.

resp.text: Dani Thank you for being part of Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts about Dr. Fields & our team.  Thanks for the kind words and the recommendation to other pet owners!

name: Leigh Smith
text:
Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has become like family to Jenni, Lola, Maggie and myself. They were there for us throughout our loss of Cooper and have taken amazing care of Lola and Maggie. The staff is incredibly friendly and quickly turn into family. They not only ask about your fur babies but also about you. I couldn't imagine going anywhere else.

We love you guys!

name: jst4kxs
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort is more than a business, it is an extended family.  They make you feel at home and there is never a worry when your pets are left in their care.  As someone who travels often, I find myself with comfort knowing they are always well taken care of.  From the time you walk in the door and greeted by smiling faces to your time in the back with the vet and staff there is never a moment you feel like you are being rushed.  Everybody takes time to explain things and always goes out of there way to take care of any issues no matter how big or small.  Wouldn’t trust anybody else in Montgomery!

resp.text: Every client & patient that comes through our doors is a member of our Goodwin Animal Hospital family!  THANK YOU for the kind words and recommending us to others looking for a new veterinarian in Montgomery.

name: Cassandra Gipson
text: I have been with Goodwin for a little over a year...started with grooming to taking care of my Baby(great grooming service!!!)...They have a an Awesome Staff friendly staff  who recognizes you and your Baby by name the second you walk in. Even when I called as a walk in last-minute appointment, they go out their way to fit me in that same day and No waiting. Fast, Friendly, and trustworthy. They made me feel/and my Baby special as if he was their Baby. Would not trade Goodwin & it's Staff for the World!!  Thank YOU for ALL YOU DO!!/Kudos!!!! PS...oophs forgot...AND the doctors are so knowledgeable and great!..Thank You Too!

resp.text: We appreciate you & your fur baby being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Jacob Johnson
text: I brought my dog in for daycare a couple of weeks ago and he was still full of energy and reeked of urine after getting him home that afternoon. Clearly they are not running these dogs hard enough or making them sit in kennels all day long. He was so thirsty when he got home too. Drank the entire bowl of water only to throw it all up a few minutes later. Very disappointed in my experience here and will not be back again.

resp.text: Jacob Our goal at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is to exceed client expectations and provide personalized care to each pet.  We apologize the experience was less than exceptional for you. We want to reach out to you but cannot find a client with your name.  Please give our manager a call as we want to discuss this with you.   Often dogs do not eat or drink as much as they do at home because of excitement or nervousness, which may be way he drank more water than normal when he went home.

name: Bet Baldwin
text: The Doctors & staff are amazing!  They are a full service facility from medical care, to boarding, to daycare, to grooming!   They treat your pets like they were your children!  I appreciate all that they do for my dogs & cats & would never take them elsewhere!  The rates fair & reasonable! Thanks for all that you do!

name: Antonia Rodden
text: Y'all are amazing, compassionate, and just all around wonderful people. We feel lucky to have y'all as our Vet/groomers/boarding place.

name: Joe River
text: From the moment we walked through the door we were greeted with a friendly and warm smile. We did not  have to wait for a very long time and to be seen. I was very happy with Goodwin Animal Hospital. I highly recommend them and their services.

name: Patricia Lassmann
text: love Goodwin Pet Resort.

name: Gary Daniel
text: Everyone was great from Vet to Boarding to Grooming!  Highly recommend!

name: Mildred Price
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is amazing! They are always attentive and we trust them to take care of our kids everyday with day care. Our three are always so excited in the morning because they can't wait to go! You guys are awesome!

name: Carol Roberts
text: We board our dog here whenever we go out of town. She's a tiny chihuahua mix and we worry about her like she was a child. We always get her a suite as it has the feeling of just being on the back porch with a screened door. She's a picky eater but the pet resort weighs her and monitors her eating throughout the stay to make sure she's ok. They take very good care of her there, and the people who take care of the pets are especially nice.

resp.text: Carol - We appreciate you & your dog being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other Montgomery pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Ralph Hill
text: Excellent experience.  Friendly staff.  Knowledgeable Vets.  We had one concern, but Dr Goodwin completely resolved it.  I will definitely recommend Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to family and friends.

resp.text: Ralph - We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts and for the kind words.

name: Kathryn Jones
text: I can't say enough great things about the wonderful care the staff has provided my dogs over the years.  Everyone there is very warm and friendly.  It 's great to have a place to take your animals where you know they are in good hands.

name: Donald Wyse
text: Highly recommended. Superior service. Have boarded and cared for my dog at this establishment for 2 years as if this writing and I have not a single complaint about it. Wonderful, caring, understanding staff with capable and patient doctors.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

name: Gwendolyn Hill
text: I had to let my Fibi go to sleep due to health issues. I got to hold her, tell her how much I love her, and how she would miss her. The staff was so supportive and still are supporting me now. I thank God blessing me with their service. Goodwin Animal Hospital is the best.

name: Ray Alvarez
text: I am very satisfied with the services my pet received at Goodwin Animal Hospital. All of the doctors are great and they really do an awesome job taking care of our 4 legged children. I highly recommend them.

name: Betty Law Morgan
text: Always friendly and helpful they take great care of our dogs and keep us well informed of everything.  They deal with the fact that our two can't be separated much better than previous vets

name: A Redoble
text: We love Goodwin! Though we do not live in Montgomery anymore, we will use them anytime we are in town and so happy to have them there for our pups!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  Please come visit us next time you are in Montgomery!

name: Stella Dallas
text: When I first came to this location a year ago I posted that I was not greeted at the front door and they looked at me like why was I there. I was pleased with their boarding photos so tried to give them another shot. They are not honest on what they tell customers and they are rude unless you are spending money on vet services. I heard them and a patient laughing about the review about the ladys cat having a UTI. I am really torn their other location is good but they both are owned by the same company or corporation so they stay in business no matter what location you. Remember a lie is a lie and a business that will lie about something small will tell you anything to get money out of you. Also a lady had posted a review about her cat dying and having a UTI and today I heard a patient and staff at Goodwin laughing about that review.

name: Hannah Ingram
text: The doctors are great and take awesome care of my puppy. Love this place. First time pet owner and they are all very helpful and friendly. Thank you everyone!

name: Ex Libbin
text: Great staff that is always eager to help. Also, the groomer Alli is out favorite. She always does the best job!

resp.text: THANK YOU!  We appreciate you sharing your thoughts.  Thanks for recommending us to other pet owners.

name: David97
text: Professional service and great customer service for all my pet questions.. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks David97 for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners - we appreciate the feedback!  We are grateful you recommend us to other pet owners.

name: Andrew Jones
text: Dr fields, dr rigsby, and nurses who are reviving a sick puppy. Office staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Heather David
text: Great doctors and staff have always taken the best care of my dog, Molly!! I can’t thank them enough esp Dr. Glasscock, Dr Fields and all the awesome staff that took care of my sweet Molly this past week!! We can’t wait to come see y’all soon!!

name: Roy Daniels
text: I am happy to say that Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has continuously completed a job well done. We are very satisfied with the service provided and the special care given to our pet. I have been with Goodwin Animal Hospital since 1996.

name: Penny Crawford
text: I had a little emergency with my pet  and the staff and Doctor's were  fantastic and so caring. I live close by 5 months out of the year so I'll go back if needed ..

resp.text: Penny - We appreciate you recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Erik Perthel
text: Overall the boarding was adequate, but if they ask if you want them to give your dogs a bath watch out cause that is a pretty penny.

name: adam esaw
text: Awesome staff that were professional and extremely personable.

resp.text: Thanks adam for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners - we appreciate the feedback!

name: Tanesha Smith
text: Dr. Field and his staff are amazing

name: Carly Livingston
text: All the staff and doctors have always taken great care of my sweet fur baby. We have never had any problems or complaints when it comes to the services and the wait time.

name: Loita Mc
text: Kind, friendly, and attentive service.

name: Margie Lambert
text: Pet care center sent us to AU for totally loss of eyesight . Then sent us to Dr Donnie and Dr Frank for her enucleation. Very impressed I need to see come get her meds refilled

name: Dan Haskall
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort are all so courteous and friendly to myself as well as my pets when we come in for their appointments. I definitely would recommend the animal hospital to others.

name: Anne Tabitha
text: I have been bringing my cat to Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort and they are terrific.

name: 3c Students
text: They are amazing, always helpful and informative!!!

name: James Barnes
text: The people at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort really cares about my animals.

name: Thomas Patrick
text: Everybody at Goodwin Animal Hospital is very friendly and kind. They take the time to listen to me and make me feel welcome.

name: Linyuan Guo-Brennan
text: We have always received friendly and professional services. Thank you!

name: Margaret Peters
text: The time we checked in to when we were put in an examination room was short at Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort.

name: Alaker Brisinger
text: don't get a job here my cousin did and there fired her for being about half an hour late but they said it was ok before when she told them on the phone.

name: Lisa Lang
text: I have just started using them and just boarded my 2 pugs with them while we were away for 5 days. My pups were clean, super soft and smelled so good when I picked them up. Even though they were super excited to see us when we got there to pick them up they were very calm so I know they were happy while there and not stressed out. I left them at another place several months back and they were shaking and nervous acting when I got there to pick them up but Not here so I definitely recommend and will definitely stick with them!!

name: Ryan Ware
text: A lot of the previous reviews have spoken for me. I would not recommend this clinic to anyone. We had a VERY BAD experience, but the follow up to our concerns were even worse. Attitude of indifference as bad as I have ever seen it. An extremely unorganized drop off, poor communication at best, pick up was obviously bad as my dog was in horrible shape (he was just fine when we dropped him off), and then like I said- couldn't have cared any less when I followed up with them for help on an avoidable $650 SPENT AT ANOTHER VET'S ER RIGHT AFTER LEAVING THIS PLACE!  Do not recommend!!!!!

name: Tiffany Newman
text: 1st time vet visit for my newly adopted pet. This vet was rude. Cut me off in mid-sentence when I was explaining my pets past history. I won’t return back here. Do not recommend at all.

name: Lauren Anderson
text: The front desk workers were very nice and professional, as well as the veterinarian that saw my puppy Draco!

name: Cathee Gipson
text: We use RRVS for daycare and boarding as well as veterinary care.  The are simply the BEST!  Dr. Myers truly loves her patients and always gives us honest advise on a level we can clearly understand.  Our dogs love the boarding suites and enjoy staying at River Region as much as we enjoy our vacations.  The daycare is AWESOME!  We all get to sleep soundly at night after they play so hard all day.  The photo shows them relaxing after a fun day with their friends at River Region Veterinary Services!

name: Kerri Fontaine
text: Just a warning for people who select River Region Vet Services.  The Vet. is very unprofessional and very rude.  I will never again recommend her services nor will I be returning.   Three different times she has shown her true colors of blaming, scolding, and almost yelling.  Nobody deserves to be treated that way.  A new customer was sitting in the lobby with me and after the Vet went back to the back the customer asked who was that?  Clearly seeing her rude bedside manner.  Her prices are too high for the horrible customer service.

name: Sierra Evans
text: Trust that you won’t know the full truth of the low star reviews. Unless something is documented and handed to you first, the price or services might change. Posting under a different name for my own protection, because I don’t think I should be threatened for stating facts.

name: Jeff Brosius
text: Started taking our new furbaby here. Vet is amazing and funny. Took care of our baby very well....

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting us to care for your baby!!

name: Brittany Little
text: Dr. Myers is the BEST. I have complete trust in her veterinary knowledge and abilities. She knows what the best course of action is for her patients, and is terrific at explaining everything in layman’s terms. We don’t take our fur babies anywhere except RRVS!

name: Terry Farmer
text: Caring and professional,  always excellent communication from veterinarian

name: Carole Dozier
text: Dr Myers and her staff at RIver Region Veterinary Services have been taking care of my dogs (babies) for almost 9 years. I can not say enough about how amazing Dr Myers is!  You can't fake how much she truly cares for animals and has their best interest in mind.  I have been through everything from new puppy care, stomach trouble, spay and neuter to kidney disease and having to let go of one of my babies. Dr Myers would not give up on my dog with a rear condition, even calling Auburn several times to confer with other veterinaries. When it was time to let my baby go she was so caring and hugged me while i cried, reassuring me that we  had done all we could. Just this past weekend one of my babies had to be hospitalized at another clinic with 24 hour care, Dr Myers called the staff there to make sure they had all the information on my dog as well as called me to check in. Above and beyond, even on her weekend off. Dr Myers will always be straight with you about your pet. Yes, some people don't like this but i would much rather have a doctor, people or animal,  tell me the truth no matter how hard it is to hear. I respect this about her. As an owner of two fat Beagles i have gotten several talks on their weight.  But i know this is because she cares about my dogs and does not want to see them suffer with what can happen to them  from being obese. It is not you are wrong and i am right, it is lets work together to help your dogs.  It is not just my husband and i that love Dr Myers and her staff, it is also my dogs that love their vet!

resp.text: Thanks, Carole, for your kind words. We have been through a lot together! We appreciate your trust in us, and love taking care of your babies.

name: Linda King
text:
Dr. Amy Myers at River Regions Vet Services is just the Bomb!!! She is always smiling and I never have to wait long to see her. The quality of care my furry babies get there is terrific!
Dr. Myers staff is wonderful and always so helpful. Ashley, her main technician, is so knowledgeable and informative. Everyone is attentive not only to my pets needs but to my needs as well.
I have other family members that take their pets to River Regions Veterinary Services. I highly recommend you do so as well!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Linda! We appreciate the kind words, and your trust in us.

name: Scott Smith
text: Awesome as usual.

name: Scott Frederick
text:
If you care about how you and your pet are treated, don’t use this Vet.

The staff seems heartless and very uncaring, especially Dr. Myers. After boarding my dog there for 2 days, she came home with bumps all over her body. When my wife called to questions this, she was told that they would not being seeing our dog anymore and that if she had bumps, that this was our problem. Dr. Myers then proceeded to curse my wife out on the phone. The treatment we received from River Region Vet Services was unprofessional and appalling.

name: Chelsea Foradori
text: I'm not sure how this place is even still open with the horror stories I hear about this "veterinarian". The fact that my family member left in tears because you refused to help a dog and instead of professionally explaining anything you just demanded the dog be sedated before returning. Without even the slightest explanation. Unprofessional to say the least.

name: CGF
text: Visited with our pug for the first time after moving to this area.  Dr. Myers took the time to explain needed treatment and made recommendations to consider.  She was mindful of costs and wasn't "pushing products."  She and her staff were pleasant and professional!  I'm glad to have found a veterinarian we can trust so close to home!  Definitely would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We enjoyed meeting you and Link this morning. Can't wait to get him better!

name: ALICE JACKSON
text: Best Doctor and staff within 100 miles! Dr. Myers is the only vet that will take care of my pets. She treats all patients with loving care — she is the best!!!

name: Lori Roy
text: We have been clients of River Region Veterinary for well over 5 years. Our children are grown and our pets are our children.It is such a blessing to have an animal lover like Amy to care for them. We have had many various veterinary hurdles over the years but she was always there for us and treated our babies like they were hers. We have had surgeries which were critical and she spent the night with them when we could not, we had overnight emergencies and she met us at the office before we could get there and stayed with us, we had difficulties giving medications and caring for one of our pets after a surgery and her caring and compassionate staff came to our home to help us, when we and our grown children have lost pets we were called and sent loving and understanding letters. We are older and have had many vets over the years, but no where have we received this level of not only professional and intuitive veterinary care but genuine love and care. Thank You so much for being such an important part of our family.

name: Justin Coleman
text: This place is great! My dogs board here basically every day. Dr Myers is very knowledgeable and helpful. It is also great to walk in and have a friendly staff member like Ashley Coleman greet you as you come in. 5 stars! Excellent!

name: Melissa Stiles
text: Dr Myers and her staff are absolutely amazing! They always greet my fur babies by name. They have been there for me for routine treatments all the way to very serious emergencies.  I recommend this facility to my friends all the time. There are two veterinarians closer to my home and I couldn’t imagine not using Dr. Meyers. River Region Vet Rocks!

name: Britney Josey
text: If I could leave 10 stars I would! I can’t tell you how much my dogs love going to see Dr. Myers and her wonderful staff!! I have been taking them to RRVS for over five years and I know I can always trust them to take the best care of my pets! I will never use another vet, they are stuck with us forever😊

resp.text: We love seeing you and your babies coming through the door!

name: Missy Piatt
text: Amy is DEFINITELY the best vet EVER!!!

name: Niki Treadaway
text:
Dr. Myers and her staff have taken great care of our pets. We were out of town when my dog had a medical emergency and Dr. Myers took excellent care of her in our absence, and even took momma dog and all 5 puppies to her house until I could have my new pet sitter pick them up from her that evening. She has gone above and beyond for us and we love and trust the care she provides.

It’s unfortunate to see some of the negative comments on here by disgruntled patients. Please form your own opinion by giving this office a call for your pets needs.

name: Mil Member
text: I had a horrible experience with this veterinarian today! Dr Myers was most unprofessional during my visit and I am appalled at her behavior.   I was berated and yelled at while Dr Myers was examining my pet this morning and this occurred in front of her staff!  I was paying for the pet exam not the attitude and personal feelings.  Needless to say, this will be the last time I use Dr Myer's services for my pets.  I have been using her since 2011 and spent plenty of money in her office.  However, there are too many other qualified, competent and caring vets available in the local area to put up with this.  I chose her because she is in my community and close to my home.  I wish I had done a better job at researching her; if I had, I would have found other reviews similar to mine which would have led me in another direction.  I am a responsible pet owner and care for my pets like they are my children.  I would never knowingly do anything to cause discomfort or harm to my pets.  There was absolutely no need for her conduct today.  Now I understand why there are flyers in her office requesting her clients to leave reviews on specific sites (this is one of them) to counter the bad reviews she has received in the past.  Please, please do your own research before selecting Dr Myers as your vet.  I don't recommend her under any conditions.

name: Connor Headlee
text: I started taking my pups here a couple months ago. It has been a great experience since. I am a first Ike dog owner and this place has made it so easy. We rescued a dog and she is in perfect health. I recently rescued another puppy who looked like he was left for dead. He had all types of worms and just poor health. This vet has helped me get my puppy healthy and they call often to check on his health. I love boarding them here as well!

name: David Williamson
text: We love Dr. Myers. And our furbabies love her also.

name: Amy Tyner
text: I love River Region veterinary services!! Wonderful staff who will take such good care of your animals! I especially love Ashley and Dr. Myers, they are the best! Take your animals there! ❤️

name: Becki Roberts
text: Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver are excellent vets. My cat has had several urinary blocks. They have been caring and dedicated to finding a solution for the problem. When they needed to refer him to another vet for surgery there was no hesitation in their referral. Thankfully things have gone well and we are in the recovery phase now. Thank you Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver.!

name: Cameron Lawracy
text: The service that Dr. Myers provides is superior to almost every vet I've ever been to. She's thorough, kind, and willing to explain her treatments. They know my family by first name, and I know they care about my dogs. The only negative is this vet is kind of expensive, but I feel like you get what you pay for. So I believe she is worth it.

name: Terrie B
text: Dr. Myers will go above and beyond for your pet.  She has been treating my pets for over 10 years. She has helped my babies in multiple emergency situations and very kind while assisting two geriatric pets over the rainbow bridge.  I highly recommend Dr. Myers and River Region Veterinary Services.

resp.text: Thanks Terrie! It is clients like you that make us love what we do.

name: Kayla Brown
text: Dr. Myers, the veterinarian, is AMAZING! She has been taking care of allcof my animals since she opened her clinic. She has saved my English Bulldog's life mamy times! The staff, even though has changed, is still extremely nice. They have a doggy daycare that you can take your dog to while you are at work. I can't stress how amazing this place is. And comparatively pricing, she may not be the cheapest (even though you get what you pay for anyway, but she is certainly cheaper than a lot of other vets! Thank you Dr. Myers, for everything!

name: josh smithart
text:
Wouldn’t recommend this veterinarian to anyone. There are many other vets in this region who will love your animals like you do. This isn’t one. BEWARE!
**i have never and will never go to this clinic**
Take a look at the reviews and responses to reviews before you settle on a vet in the prattville area.

resp.text: You have never been to this hospital.

name: jerrold Haskin
text: Well I am in the process of looking for another Vet.  To many strikes in just 3 short months of using this facility.  (1). I boarded my dog for 3 to 4 days and he developed Kennel Cough.  They prescribed medicine that I had to pay for, but he developed Kennel cough at their facility.  He’s 8 years old and never had this happen before.  (2) Took my dog in for grooming at 7 am.  Told it would take 3 hours, after not receiving a phone call I followed up at 1pm, only to be told my dog was groomed, except nails.  He would be ready after groomer retuned from lunch.  Why not finish him, nails take 5 mins???  Well then I go pick him up a hour later and he still not ready.  So the person working the front counter goes back and cuts his nails and now he is bleeding from that experience as I take him home.  (3). While I’m waiting at front counter for my dog another gentleman brings his dog in who is barking quite a bit.  I happen to look back at the Counter Rep and catch her look of disgust of having to deal with this dog. (4) I call on Weekend because my dog has ear infection, Doc calls me back after second message and says it will have to wait till Monday.  Gives me remedies I had already looked up, but no option to get medicine after hours.  I brought my dog in Germany and he has lived in and been cared for Vets on Turkey, Tucson Arizona, Chicago, and Alaska.  Never have we had any of these experiences, and I have all these in 3 short months..  Time to move on and I tried to give benefit of doubt.  Just cannot keep doing it and they really need to have people work the front counter that displays a loving attitude toward pets.  They faces don’t say I love doing this for a living.

name: Melissa Bazzell
text: Dr. Myers has always been professional and taken good care of our animals.  Dr. Myers and her staff were very kind and caring when we had to put our Boxer down because she had cancer.  They are very down to earth and easy to talk to and always answer our questions.  Thanks Dr. Myers and Staff!!

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Dr. Myers and her staff are my first choice to provide care for my pets.  They always get top notch treatment at the clinic, and the staff is exceptional in their knowledge, explanation, and their compassion for not only my pets - but for my family as well.  Thank you for all you do!

name: Kirby Thompson
text: Superb people, awesome facility!  Our puppy, McCue gets the greatest care.  He loves going to DayCare so much he meets us at the door after breakfast.  Once on the property we have to hold him back as he charges for the front door.  We love y'all, keep up the good work!

resp.text: McCue is always a bright spot in our day!

name: Kayla Mason
text: This facility is so nice! All of the staff members were helpful, courteous, and a joy to be around. I would definitely recommend this clinic to other pet owners!

name: Sylvia Coleman
text: Awesome! Very helpful with whatever my dog needs. Great staff especially Ashley Coleman!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love seeing Tux come in the door.

name: Gipson's Tire Bob
text: Always great and timely service from the friendliest people!

name: Jeremy Pease
text: Vet service is great.  I would not recommend boarding though.  Sunday pickup person was 20 minutes late and not very friendly.  Food we portioned for dogs was not given as instructed and to was urine soaked which leads me to believe they were confined too long.

name: Kathleen Daughtry
text: I have always had a wonderful experience at this clinic. The staff is wonderful and Dr. Myers is always willing to go the extra mile to help her human and animal clients.

name: Alex Ray
text: I took my dog here to be groomed due to the convenience to my house and the price difference compared to other groomers ( other were 80-90, river regions confirmed TWICE it wouldbe $60) They tried to charge $75 when he was picked up claiming they did not know who told me $60. Since my husband picked him up he just paid them $60 and didn't question the cut. The cut looks nothing like the reference picture, I asked to blend the fur so there would not be choppy lines (he is a Great Pyrenees's)  the cut was choppy, uneven, and to WAY to short (he was not matted)

name: RaBin Kim
text:
The doctor is extremely ignorant and unprofessional.

I took my puppy to this vet about a week ago. When I got out of the car the doctor was going to her car saying hello to me. And she left. Went inside and there was a young lady at the counter asking me and my husband “what can I help you?”, we said “our puppy keeps throwing up all day”. And now she says “Actually the doctor is not here for today. We can’t help you” so we said we just so her in the parking lot but it’s okay we will leave.

A day later my husband got an e-mail from the doctor basically saying “Your wife was rude. Please find another vet. We can provide your pets data.”

We were so upset with the doctors ignorance and unprofessionalism but later on we just felt pitty for her bad behavior. We are changing the vet. Please do not use this vet.

What is the point if a vet is open without doctor? This is a totally stupid situation.

resp.text:
We are a single doctor practice, so we work by appointment. We were leaving the clinic to make a house call when you arrived, and I spoke to you in the parking lot. You said nothing about your puppy being sick, and he was running around like he was fine. I assumed you were there for boarding or something else that does not require my presence so I left to see another client.
When my receptionist offered to call me and have me return you were rude and disrespectful. I do not tolerate people mistreating my staff, and that is why you got the email. None of this has anything to do with me being "ignorant and unprofessional", and everything to do with your repeatedly being rude to my staff.

name: Marion Crutchfield
text: We have been using Dr. Meyers since 2012.  We initially had 2 senior dogs who passed in 2013 and 2014.  One of them developed cancer and Dr. Meyers amputated the cancerous leg and gave her another year with us.  We adopted another rescue from the shelter Thanksgiving 2014 and took her to Dr. Meyers who immediately found parasites and identified a broken hip that hadn't healed.  Dr. Meyers said the surgery wasn't absolutely necessary but we scheduled it anyway.  Jan 14th she will get her hip fixed and I look forward to long walks with our new companion because right now a walk completely does her in for a few days..  I have complete trust in and respect for the staff at River Region Vet Services.  They handle every situation with so much grace and make you feel so special.

name: Jason Bryant
text: These folks were very caring and really went the extra mile to look after my cat.  Thank you very much.

name: Lewis Shepherd
text: I was in from out of town and my Shih Tzu started having problems with her eyes. The vet took me right away as a walk in, even guided me in on the phone. Not only did she diagnose the issue correctly, but pointed out some early warning signs of other issues. I'm extremely happy with my experience, and highly recommend this office.

name: TERRY Tanner
text: Excellent people, always take good care of my dogs!

resp.text: Thanks so much Terry! We love taking care of your rotten babies.

name: Roscoe
text: First off I will say I like Dr. Myers.  Used her as my only vet when we first moved to Prattville, a bit on the expensive side.  This being said.  I changed vets due to the fact when I needed her for a new puppy that had parvo, I was told on a Friday to call back on Saturday.  We were told to call on Monday because Dr. Myers was off that weekend.  So now we are using a great vet with better prices and has 24 hr care right here in Prattville.  And our puppy is alive and well.

name: Leslie Donovan
text: I visited this clinic because of the location, convenient to my home.  I realized immediately that the veterinarian wanted to add every service she could think of to my visit to rack up a big bill.  This was almost laughable, because she made a comment about my purse and that she had one just like it.  It was a designer bag that she took to mean I had all kinds of money, and proceeded to try and take advantage of the situation. My dogs have always had continuous care with a vetrinarian and I knew they did not need all she was prescribing. My dog had some allergies and outbreaks on his belly, and all he really needed to start with was a good allergy shampoo, not antibiotics and a special skin condition medication.  I would NOT recommend this clinic.  I always recommend questioning medications and doing alot of your own research.

name: Bill Crum
text: Great for your pets. Mine love paws at play

name: Sandra Hines
text: Dr. Amy Myers has always been very helpful and taken great care of my animals. She has been our Vet. since she started her work in Prattville, AL.

name: L W
text: If I could leave negative 5 stars I would. EXTREMELY unprofessional, non caring. No passion for Veterinary medicine from anyone employed here which is needed to perform in a humane fashion in this type of field. DO NOT take your pets here.

name: Midori Matsumoto
text: My experiece with River Region Vet Services was amazing. We have recently purchased a wonderful puppy named Spike and our visit to River Region helped us alot. The staff was wonderful and the receptionist knew us from our last visit. She remembered Spike and was very kind, helpful, and made us feel as if we were family. I am not sure of the other reviews, but I can honestly say that I couldn't think of a better vet service to go to. As far as being to expensive I really can not agree. When I compared the prices just for Spike's vaccination we would have spent over $200 just to have them see him and do a physical. At River Refions our bill was no more then $75.50 for all his shots and physical combined. I suppose everyone have their opinions but in my personal opinion, I will go no where else for Spike's check ups and vaccinations. My experience there was more then I expected.

name: Chelsea Ethridge
text: If I could give 0 stars I would! Possibly the most unprofessional and rude human being I have ever met.

resp.text: We spent a lot of time with your dog trying to just get our hands on her, even though she has already been banned from one facility. I was nice to you until you laughed about your dog shredding my arm. Your behavior was less acceptable than your dog.

name: Melissa Carden
text:
The vets at RRVS are phenomenal. Some reviewers have posted negative reviews based on the vets "trying to make money by suggesting more services." To these reviewers, I say, they are the ones with the veterinary degrees--don't you think they know what your pet needs? If you just want a vet who will give your pet the bare minimum (basic yearly vaccines), then, by all means, go somewhere else. If you want a vet that will take care of your pet proactively, then this is your place.
The staff at RRVS are wonderful as well. With a very low turnover rate, the front desk staff know us on sight--myself, my husband, and our pet--and always make us feel welcome and cared for.
RRVS is the only vet in Central Alabama that I will use.

name: Jude Crelot
text: This vet, specifically Dr. Myers, did and unnecessary surgery, without my consent on my dog. She lies about prices of things saying a cheaper price so will say ok then when you go to pay its almost double what you were told, I have personally seen her drinking \using drugs. She spreads lies about her patient's owners on social media, and she told someone close to me after a major surgery she had a machine that would help her heal, but for her not to tell anyone. Thinking OK this can't hurt she let Dr. Myersdo this treatment which caused more harm to this person. People stay away from this vet, I do not want unnecessary unethical things done to my furbabies!

resp.text: Jude Crelot has never been to River Region Veterinary Services. This review is intended to retaliate for us taking her friend to court to receive payment for treatments done to her pet. The courts found in our favor, shortly before this review was posted. It is a shame that people can post complete slanderous garbage on this site.

name: Steven Perry
text: Very friendly up to date on new types of vaccinations and treatments

name: Sue Herbert
text: Great veterinarian and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Sue! We are glad you trust us to care for your fur babies!

name: Kelly Brand
text: Rude and snotty. Won't go back!

resp.text: Kelly Stroud has never been to River Region Veterinary Services.

name: Trey Poole
text: Great people

name: Ashley Mink
text: I highly recommend this place!! This was the fourth vet I took my very sick kitten too and they didn’t even hesitate and told me to bring him in right away and took care of him all day and even offered for me to bring him back the next day since I had no one to monitor him and feed him regularly while I was at work. I could tell everyone here genuinely cared and it was a great feeling. Unfortunately he didn’t make it and the next morning, they called to check on me. Thank you to everyone that helped Shiloh and fought for him.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave this kind review. I'm very sorry about sweet little Shiloh. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Elizabeth Bailey
text: If you want good people to treat you well and treat your animal like it's the only animal around you need to go here these people are the absolute best

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We really appreciate it!

name: Jessica Keith
text: Took our 7 week old kitten here for her first round of shots and they were so sweet and helpful. They loved on our kitten and answered all of our questions! Will definitely be using them as our vet from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! It was a pleasure to meet you and care for Molly!

name: Tiffany Lipska
text: We took our German Shepherd to doggie daycare for a couple days while we camped out. They treated my puppy like family and were super nice! He came home happy each day!

name: John Carr
text: During the past twenty-four years, Dr. Whitfield has cares for our four legged family in a most superior way. This includes procedures without anesthesia due to the old age of the pet. We have developed a long standing friendship between his family and ours over this period of time. Once when our Cocker was experiencing seizures Doctor Whitfield made a home visit. Hard to beat!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you and Freddie as part of our family!

name: Jerry Warnock
text: All of the staff demonstrate a caring and professional attitude.  They genuinely care for the animals and clients well being.  I have never been disappointed with their grooming or  medical care of my dog.  In fact, I suspect they spoil her a bit as she does not hesitate to go with them when I drop her off.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this great review! Your suspicions are correct! How could we resist such a "Precious" face?!

name: John Morris
text: I’ve been going to Oakview for almost 16 years. From the beginning they have been professional, reliable caring, and have become like family. They were the first veterinary clinic I used when I got my first pup. Wonderful staff and very personable. It’s like having a vet in a small town. I will continue using them for our veterinary medicine needs for years to come.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave this review! We appreciate you trusting us with Acre and Bo's care!

name: Robert Chaisson
text: Friendly, caring and knowledgeable people, who are always helpful and caring when it comes to your pets need, would recommended 1000%

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! We have loved caring for, and watching Warrior grow.

name: Amy Serrano
text: I love this place!!!!!   Everybody is so caring.  I trust them implicitly with my cat.  Dr.  Robinson always follows up to make sure her suggestion/treatment has worked.  She always takes time to answer my questions.  Way to go, Oakview!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you as a part of the family!

name: Kim Winsett
text: All the staff is extremely friendly!!!  Never had any issues with anyone.  Everyone is super nice and love animals.  They do not force services on you and always answer all your questions.  My girls are not afraid to visit the vet.

name: Amanda Laddie
text: Swapped vets due to several repeat issues with our prior. The service at Oak View was quick, professional and comprehensive. I appreciated the friendliness of all staff members and the care they had for our furbabies.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Shay Steel
text: Kristin, the groomer, does an amazing job on my two dogs. They are always so clean, smell so good and have the cutest haircuts when they leave. Most importantly, my dogs are happy. The staff at Oakview is kind and caring towards the animals in their care. What a great place!

name: Ellen Neely
text: The best vets around.  Love them.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We have loved caring for John Parker and Kodiak as they have grown up. Thank you for your loyalty and trust!

name: Melissa J
text: Oak View Animal Hospital has been beyond kind. When I first went there with my new puppy, they wrote me a handwritten note welcoming me to the clinic and had also thanked me for working as a nurse during Covid. Since that time they have given my dog personalized care and answered my questions as an over-anxious dog mom. They also get my pup in quickly if i have any concerns and send me reminders about appointments. Very good vet clinic to go to!

name: Clarissa Powell
text:
Love the staff and Veterinarians at Oakview!

They are all so helpful and knowledgeable and take excellent care of our furbabies.

Service and compassion for animals is #1

resp.text: We appreciate the sweet review! Thanks for trusting us with your furbabies!

name: Brooke McClellan
text: The staff is so friendly and really cares!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-stars! We really appreciate it! We look forward to seeing you and Cash again!

name: Melissa Hull
text: I have had great experiences with all of the doctors and staff at Oak View! I always recommend them when I get the chance. When I had to put down my 17 yo dog they were so incredibly accommodating and respectful. Dr. Robinson was there to help me along the way!

name: Rider 0401
text: Such a wonderful experience today!  I am a first timer to Oak View and took my newly adopted pomeranian for shots and grooming. The entire staff was so friendly, knowledgeable and took excellent care of my little guy!  Kristin did a fabulous job grooming him, he looks adorable!  Thanks for taking such good care of Hamlet today, y'all are the best!

name: BisonAP
text: They've been a part of my life for a number of years. All the dogs I've had entrusted to their care get the sincerest of effort and the utmost in kindness & compassion, which both animals and their owners can use from time to time. It's not "just a job" with them. They really, really care. And that goes a long way with me. 🐾🐾♥️👍

name: Chasity Gilmer
text: I love using Oak View Animal Hospital for my puppies grooming needs. I have taken all three of my dogs there and they have come home smelling amazing and super soft. The employees are so sweet and patient will my big pups. I will continue to take all three in the future.

name: Tony Oddo
text: Always show me the professionals that they are. Take utmost care of my boy Alex...and always check back with me on care and test results. All around...good people!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this sweet review! We always look forward to seeing you and Alex!

name: Amanda Counts
text: Very kind, open lines of communication, took great care of our pets while we were on vacation.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Dorothy Sarvaunt
text: I have been bringing my babies here for years and let me just say that even with the pandemic they have gone above and beyond. They are always there when we need them, they are all well trained and professional and above all else they truly care about  your pet and you! I even get follow up calls after a visit from the Dr. to make sure everything is ok. I Can't speak highly enough of this office. Thank you so much!

name: Sarah Tamburello
text: I LOVE this vet. They take care of your dogs as if they are one of their own. I highly recommend!!

name: Sarah Mayfield
text: Oakview staff have been with us through five dogs and four cats. Need I say more?  Everyone there has, provided up-to-date care,  charged reasonable fees, been kind, and showed compassion, especially when our pets got terminal diseases, needed comfort care, and eventually had to be put to sleep.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Mrs. Mayfield! We will always be here for you if you need anything!

name: Morgan Pettus
text: Oak view is the best!! I take both of my Boston’s there and couldn’t ask for a better place.  Great customer service and so understanding and able to fit in ASAP.

name: MaryJo Sewell
text: The techs and doctors are Oak View are top-notch!  We recently had to have both of our dogs put down which was devastating for our family.  Dr. Robinson, Julie and the rest of the crew were so kind and attentive to us during (and after) this difficult time.  I absolutely give them the highest recommendation in the world.  Your pets will be blessed over and over to have any of these doctors & their staff take care of your furry friends!

name: Larae Ganger
text: Dr. Robinson is great and is so patient with my VERY ANXIOUS great dane.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We hope Chapel is doing well!

name: Whitney Hackworth
text: The staff was great! They were very attentive and prompt. I especially loved that the vet came to the car to explain everything to me so I could understand completely! I will definitely be changing over to this clinic.

name: Victoria Covarrubias
text: Absolutely love them. Just started taking out new fur baby about two months ago and they have been wonderful. Very friendly staff!!!

name: Kaitlyn Poff
text: I have been taking my goldendoodle here to be groomed for about 6 months now and love it! He comes back looking like a doodle and not a poodle, and always so happy! Would recommend Oak View to anyone looking for a great groomer and vet!

name: Rock Fish
text: The entire staff shows that they "truly" care about my pets!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us  a 5 star review! We really appreciate it!

name: Sheryl Sheppard
text: I took my fur baby for a meet and greet, she is a 6 yr old mini schnauzer and although we live in Pelham now, we were driving to our long time veterinarian in Trussville. I wanted a clinic close to us. After requesting an appointment, the office contacted me and were very helpful and friendly. We had the opportunity to meet one of the vet techs and a veterinarian, who both understood  her and her personality. I only gave 4 stars since this clinic is only doing “curbside” visits, when many places have opened since the COVID pandemic. I wasn’t made aware of this until we arrived and honestly would have postponed our appointment until we could be seen inside. I would have rather see the interaction between the staff and my dog. We’ll probably go for her annual appointment for vaccines and see how that goes.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I apologize that our curbside policy wasn't addressed when you made your appointment, but I am happy to announce that our lobby is now open! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Janice Eubank
text: Oakview is like taking our dogglettes to a Pediatrician’s office. They truly care about our little dudes, remember their names and treat us humans the same way. Covid has created some distance in our face to face interactions but we still feel the same way. Julie Jordan Evans and Brandy Skinner consistently treat us as family. Dr Robinson and Dr. Robinson, are not only experts in Small Animal Surgery and Diagnostics, they are also experts in the soft skills of relaying results and treatment in common language. There’s no Vet Clinic that is comparable.

name: Jade Sisk-trott
text: Staff is caring and listened to my every detail about what is going on with my diabetic dog, my elderly dog and all my cats. Much respect. And Sydney is the best receptionist, always sweet and helpful.

name: west W
text: Wonderful experience and very professional. Our Sunny loves Oak View.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! Sunny is always a sweet boy!

name: Chloe M. Gooden Ministries
text:
Friendly
Quick service
Nice
Didn’t do unnecessary things to raise prices
Will be back for his annual care

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Milo!

name: Jennifer Kimbrough
text: I REALLY loved Dr. Early. She seemed to really actually care about my GiGi and was so kind to me too! :) GiGi’s excited to see her again in 3 weeks!

name: Maggie Shannon
text: Dr. Robinson and the entire staff at Oak View Animal Hospital are exceptional. They are absolutely the best in total care, follow up, kindness and genuine interest for their 4-legged patients in addition to giving treatment details and compassion to pet parents!

name: Phillip Campbell
text: Everyone there is so friendly and compassionate. We would not go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us all these years! We love Aunt Bee!

name: Meghan Hall
text: Thanks for getting us in quickly to help our Nala kitty. She's feeling much better and I really appreciate the doctor calling to check in on her! Love Oak View!!

name: Nancy Paschal
text: We are from out of town and our dog became ill. They fit her into their schedule and she is feeling better now. They were friendly and professional.

name: Michelle Spann
text: We have used Oak View for all of our animals. Dr. Robinson is very personable and knowledgeable. We would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a good veterinarian!

name: annie lynch
text: Everyone at Oakview at Fabulous!!!  We love Julie, the staff and all the Doctors!!   They are the best around and very reliable!

name: Traci White
text: They treat Leo well and Sydney makes sure he’s happy.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! We all love Leo!

name: omar pittman
text: They are on time and very nice. They take care of your baby as if they were theirs. That’s what you want to pay for when you could go anywhere.

name: Theresa Moore
text: Dr. Robinson and Julie always take care of my Mia!  Never questions the care she gets when she is at the Clinic.  Mia loves going to see them and can't wait to get out of the car!

name: Christina Mahaffey
text: The entire staff is great! Oak View has taken care of our fur babies for a long time and I trust them to be caring and professional

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Dr. Robinson is the best!   My dog only “smiles” at 4 people and she’s one of them. Even though my dog received a shot and dye in her eye during her visit, she still loves her. I drive all the way from alabaster to Oak View because of how nice everyone treats my dogs.

name: Bailey Mills
text: I brought in my dog when I first got her. She was older and I didn’t know the kinda shape she was in. I had a lot of questions and concerns about taking care of her. The doctor helped me work it out and answered all of my questions. I felt more prepared to be a puppy parent after taking my dog to OakView. I was extremely pleased and will continue to take her there.

name: Brian J Less
text: This has been a staple in Pelham for years for veterinary care from back when Murphy was there to now. Great place!!!!

name: Queenmommy Murphy
text: We love everyone at Oak View. They genuinely care about their clients and pets.

name: Lyn Hughes
text: Great people, caring staff! Can’t imagine going elsewhere...

name: Sam Cook
text: First time wellness exam was free and they all enjoyed my dog. Gave me some recommendations for treating his separation anxiety as well.

name: Michael Rowland
text:
We love Dr Robinson
She’s so compassionate and I love that she personally calls to update us on our dog and also check in on our dog to make sure he is ok.

name: Chuck McBryde
text: I didn’t expect to be able to go back with my dog but I did get to and I think that was huge for him.

resp.text: Chuck, we are so happy to hear you had a positive experience with us! We loved meeting you and Cash!

name: Alexandra Smith
text: My big weim boy, Willie Nelson, had to spend a week here while we were in between selling our home and moving to another. Daphne, the kennel manager left a sweet note about Willie's stay and built a feeding system for him with the food we brought. Willie is usually a very inconsistent eater but it seems like he is going to stick to it now. Pricing is always great and fair... especially for the care given. Thank you Daphne and all the wonderful staff!

name: Melissa Paruszkiewicz
text: Dr. Robinson is the best! She always takes time to answer questions, and I don’t feel dumb or like I’m a bother to her.

name: Leigh Morgan
text: Love the staff at oak view! And they love my pups!

name: Jenny McCallum
text: Dr. Early and Julie are so wonderful kind, wonderful and gentle. They are both so welcoming to my dogs.  Julie knows how to make my skittish dog, Jackson, feel comfortable with lots of love and peanut butter! Oak View is so amazing, I am so glad I found them. I always feel heard and never rushed! Thank you for always caring for my fur babies!!

name: marsha bowers
text: I was very grateful that Dr. Whitfield was so patient with my incessant questioning.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Pebbles!

name: Phaedra Galloway
text: Dr Whitfield has cared for our pets for over 20 years. The other doctors and staff I’ve seen at Oak view have been excellent as well.

name: A Google User
text: Love these folks!!! Everyone is so nice and accommodating.  They give full attention to my dog's needs.  Highly recommend!!

name: melanie long
text: Dr Early is very sweet and relatable

name: Cami Velazquez
text: Oak View has been amazing to work with! Our puppy is always able to be seen in a timely manner, and they send helpful emails with reminders about health maintenance. They are always willing to answer all of our many questions and provide excellent care of our puppy! I would highly recommend Oak View to anyone in search of a vet!

name: Johnny Carmack
text: Prompt, professional personal touch.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this review! Thank you for trusting us with CiCi & Cookie's care!

name: Lisa Phipps
text: Staff is always kind. Never had to wait very long to be seen.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We really appreciate it!

name: Betsy Schmidt
text: I love Oak View! My family has been using them for years.

name: Cody C
text: The docs and staff here genuinely care.

name: Allen Goodwine
text: Whitfield is so caring.  Willing to take time to speak with us on phone.  Then staff so helpful and friendly.

name: Kelly Brennan
text: I brought in a rescue we named Roscoe. The staff we very professional, extremely sweet, but most important, loving and helpful to this amazing pup who unexpectedly made his way into our lives. They went above and beyond what they needed to in order to make sure he is healthy! They answered all my questions thoroughly and took their time, even though we were the last appointment (that we were able to book right before lunch) of the day (on a Monday at that!). They even made him a goody bag with treats, doggy bags, and a toy for him!! Outstanding care. Kudos to this practice!

name: Debra Milton
text: Everyone was terrific, my sheltie warmed up to the Vet and staff (which he NEVER does) immediately that in itself made me comfortable.  Kudos to the groomer she did an awesome job with our sheltie.  Thanks, everyone.  Debra Milton

name: Butch Burbage
text: I am a long time patron of Oak View. I have always received first class service from both doctors and techs every time I’ve been in. I trust them completely with all of our pets. I wholeheartedly recommend you use this facility for all of your pet needs. On this particular visit, they were able to see my dog Izzy right away for a concern I had. Everything turned out great! Thank you so very much for your care and treatment of Izzy.

name: Bruce Bursi
text: Always kind to my super anxious dog and so nice to deal with.

name: Carolyn S Harrison
text: The staff were kind and professional, as was Dr. Early. They all clearly care a great deal for animals. The price was comparable to other animal clinics. This was our first visit, since moving here from Montgomery. I am so thrilled that we have found a good veterinarian were we live now.

name: Jan Bailey
text:
We have been going to Oak View for 10 years at least. Love the staff and Dr.'s, they are all very helpful and caring.
Had dental work done today, several teeth pulled. Dr. called me after procedure and let me know what all they had to do and assured me my Maya was doing well. Love this place.

Jan Bailey

name: John McQueen
text: Exceptionally great group of Veterinarian doctors that really care for your pets!

name: Kim Downs
text: Our first visit was on Wed and I really liked Dr. Early. Even with Covid restrictions, I felt like she took the time to answer all my questions and make suggestions to help me properly care for Shelby!

name: haley arnott
text:
this was my first time coming here with my dog and they were absolutely amazing!! so friendly, not overly priced at all.. my dog absolutely loved it and she came home so happy.
very, very professional.. i’m going to start coming there regularly.
thank you to everyone for taking care of my sweet pup today!

name: Robert Milstead
text: Outstanding Pet Care Family!

name: Thomas Brown
text: Kristen did a fantastic job!  Best haircut Duchess has had in a long time!

name: Cam AP
text: Vets here are friendly, reasonable prices also

name: Anna Strutzenberg
text: They allowed animal control to take a friends dog away by animal control and then be euthanized. She called multiple times per week to check on her fur baby to make sure he was safe. They lied to her throughout those weeks knowing full and well what they had done.

name: Linda Lemoine
text: I was very pleased with my cat grooming experience. My cat is Phoebe and she had an appointment on 08-14.

name: Lorena Juarez
text: I just adopted two Pomeranians and I decided to take them to Oak View Animal Hospital for a check up. I was surprised of how professional they were and I really liked how they explained everything they did. I highly recommend them.

name: Amanda Dinsmore
text: Dr. Robinson feels like part of our family- she certainly takes care of our four-legged babies.

name: Dan Mabie
text:
Oakview is a truly excellent clinic. We've received some of the best medical care imaginable from Dr. Robinson and Dr. Early, as well as all the staff. They helped treat our dog through chemo, and made it a bearable experience for our corgi, but they also gave us all the options and kept us on the right track throughout the whole process, making sure that we were considering the health and happiness of our pet first and not pushing us to any decision.

We drive an extra 30 minutes to go to Oakview and are happy to do it every time.

name: Patrick J Henry
text: We were attended to right away, given medicine for the dog, and as usual, everything went find.

name: Bryant Cline
text: Excellent communication. Great customer service with a smile.

name: ellana lecroy
text: Dr Whitfield and staff ROCKS❤

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We love getting to see Roxy Tutu!

name: Clif Render
text: We love the staff at Oak View and the care and kindness that they have consistently shown to me and my family members (both the furry ones and the non-furry ones, too)! They've seen us through fostering, adopting, and navigating the painful process of terminal cancer. They've become a part of our extended family and I recommend that you consider making them a part of yours as well.

name: D Thompson
text: My experience with Oak View has not been very good since Dr. Whitfield left.  The techs  are very courteous and helpful but the new young vets lack the experience, knowledge, and compassion that is needed for our furry family members.

name: Nelson Bates
