text: Update: The vet techs lied to me. They euthanized our dog without a court order and so much as a phone call. I gained this information from the Manager of the city of pPelham. We boarded our dog with this clinic on June 1, 2020. We are homeless because of covid. My wife has contacted them several times checking on him and discussed services that they offer. We got a coupon via PetSmart and Shelby humane to have him neutered in Irondale. When we went to get our dog the clinic had adopted him out. Instead of being professional and admitting their mistake and helping us to bing our family member home they blamed my wife. They said that they attempted to contact us. They did not. Because we refused the $475 quote does not mean we care any less for our animal. His name is Axle And is a blonde Rot/Lab mix. He had to have been adopted the last 3 days because she had just declined their over priced  neuter service. We went to bring him home today and they said he had been adopted. They hung up on us numerous times and failed to provide any help. We want our dog.

name: Molly Bennett
text: My first experience taking my pet to Oak View was wonderful.  Caring staff, great hours, perfect location.  Dr. Elizabeth Robinson is the best!  I highly recommend them.

name: becky filler
text: Lee is awesome, she works front desk and always tries to help. Dr. Robinson is so great with my Boston terrier Charlie. You can tell he feels loved. He is always happy to go to the vet.

name: Linda Hall
text: I am from out of state and everyone at the office, the receptionist, the vet techs, and the Dr. were so kind and caring towards me and my sick kitty. They were able to get me in on a Saturday morning for which I am so grateful .

name: Noah Mitchell
text: The Dr’s And staff are all amazing and great people and provide great service for your pets. They always take care of any concerns I have and follow up with phone calls after the visit to make sure everything is good.

resp.text: Noah - Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View Animal Hospital.  Glad we are able to provide you peace of mind and give you the answers you need and deserve. We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners and are thankful for the kind words & feedback.

name: KD Burchfield
text: The staff and docs at Oak View are amazing! They are always so kind, ready to help, and appointments are on time and thorough. They are gentle and understanding with animals, prices are very reasonable too. They have been taking care of my little @chica.lulu for 6 years and now our newest addition, 14yo Nacho. We HIGHLY recommend them!

resp.text: KD - We appreciate you recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Rebecca Davis McClard
text: The entire staff is very kind and professional. You can tell that they love the animals as much as the owners. I am embarressed to say I do not recall the name of the young lady who assisted Dr. Robinson with my kitten Myth, but she was very sweet, very informative, and over all very gentle with Myth (plus I think he liked her and that is always a sign of a good person to me). Dr. Robinson was cheerful, informative, and takes the care of her patients seriously and for that I am very thrilled to have her as the vet for my cats.

resp.text: Rebecca Welcome to our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for the feedback & taking the time to share your thoughts. We look forward to being your partners in your cat's health.

name: Heather Ramsey
text: The people at Oak View are wonderful. They have loved and cared for my dog for 7 years almost like he was their own! We have a new puppy and we took her right in for a check up with Dr. Elizabeth, who is wonderful. I had a couple of vets before I moved to this area and they ran the gamut from lazy/didn't care to very expensive/pushy sales, and at Oak View I've experienced none of that. They genuinely care, their prices are reasonable, and they LOVE animals. :) I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new vet.

name: Kimberly Bavali
text: Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson take care of our dogs, Lucy and Cody.  We could not be more pleased with the quality of the treatment they receive. We have complete confidence in their expertise.  Beyond that, we greatly appreciate their kindness, warmth and personal approach.  They are just wonderful!  What a great staff as well!  The whole practice reflects a dedication to their mission.

name: Diann Hendon
text: I've always been pleased with the service they offer. Their kindness and concern for my dog is their greatest asset.  No question goes unanswered.  Also, it's great to get a call checking to see how my dog is doing........proves they care about their patients.  Everyone who works there is friendly and cares about everyone who comes to see them (pets and owners).  I will continue to take my pet there as long as I have a pet.

name: Laurie Howard
text: I love everyone that works here. Julie is my favorite. You all care, y’all are friendly, you love the animals. You don’t make it all about the money. Love you all. Thank you from Laurie, Nik, Charlee, and Cooper.

name: Kim Weaver
text: There was no wait time and I was in and out very quickly. Dr. Robinson is very knowledgeable and very helpful. The receptionist is very nice. The tech was great, and the Hospital Manager Brandy is amazing and very helpful. I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else!

resp.text: Kim - We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Madelyn P
text:
I’ve always had great service here and felt like my pets and even my family was cared for.

Several years back we had a family pet put to sleep here. He was twelve, and it was done in the most respectful, quiet, and dignified way possible. I really appreciated the staff and how genuine and empathetic everyone was.

Now we have two more family pets and I have to come up here with my (almost twin) babies. A technician or the secretary always helps me get my children and pets in and out in one safe trip.

I do not know the name of the technician that my son loves so much, but she is always here during the mornings and picks him up and carries him around and distracts him while I’m talking to the vet and waiting for my turn.

10/10 I’d recommend this vet to anyone

resp.text: Madelyn - THANK YOU! We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners and for all your kind words about our team.

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: A friend of my daughter's had her five pound kitten spayed and two kitty shots and the bill was $452. That is outrageous. I have no knowledge of the level of care but, I do feel that she was taken advantage of. We do lots of rescue work and have never seen charges like this. Lesson learned, never send a kid to a vet clinic like this one with her pet. I hate leaving a bad review but feel like a warning is necessary.

resp.text: Dana - we wish you would contact us directly with your concerns.  Then we could explain what was agreed upon before any services were performed.  Since you are not a client, we realize you do not know us and that Oak View Animal Hospital prides ourselves on treating each client like family and each patient like our own pet.  Our veterinarian spoke with the client about this situation directly and took steps to alleviate her concerns.

name: MR
text: I’ve been using Oak View for 9 years. Drs. Price and Robinson took great care of my dog then, and my dogs since. Dr. Robinson is always very thorough and listens and responds to all my questions. All are helpful and have been compassionate throughout the lives of the three dogs I’ve brought in to Oak View.

resp.text: We appreciate you & your dogs being part of our family for all these years!! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Laurabi Lace
text: I recently got a puppy and asked my friends and coworkers to recommend a good vet. Everyone I talked to said Oak View is the best. A few had stories of other vets they had used that they were not happy with. They are so sweet to our little girl. We are very happy with them.

resp.text: Welcome to the Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your puppy. We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Monica Moore
text: I have had so many positive experiences with this vet.  The vet personally called several times to check on my fur baby after surgery.  We went in for another issue and the vet personally called to check on her to make sure she was improving as hoped.  Would recommend them to anyone looking for a vet!!  Added plus the front desk lady is super sweet and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you!  Our staff enjoys taking care of Oreo and all of our clients.

name: Mary Jo Sewell
text: The staff and doctors are always so friendly at Oak View.  Anytime one of our pets have had to have surgery, or been hurt, the next day Dr. Robinson will call personally  to check and make sure they are doing okay.  We have never had our animals treated this well.  We love her for the wonderful care she gives our pets. The staff make each and every one of our pets feel like a "rock star!"  I highly recommend this vet!

resp.text: So happy you are part of our family! Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners looking for a veterinarian.

name: Natalie
text: The vet here is for real probably the sweetest and kindest PERSON I’ve ever met in my life. She loves animals and is somehow just as nice to humans. I LOVE this place. Even the front desk people are sweet. We’ve been going here for many years now and have never had bad service.

name: Birmingham Chapter
text: I have been using Oak View Animal Hospital for 5 years. They have taken wonderful care of my sweet dog Maggie. The entire staff is incredibly nice. Dr. Price is wonderful. He provided a treatment option for my dog who was having trouble leaking urine when other vets I had been to were unable to help. They will personally call and check-up on your pet if they have been sick or injured. I have been very pleased with the exceptional care they have provided for our family!

name: Lacey Bacchus
text: I recommend Oak View to everyone.  The doctors and staff are personable, caring and friendly and take a genuine interest in your pet's health.  I had used a previous vet in the past and never felt like they remembered me or my dog and never called to follow-up like Oak View does.

name: Booba Byars
text: Could not have been a better experience. All aspects of the results of my needs being met were great! My dog Sully rules and he loves it when I take him to Oak View Animal Hospital. The staff members are tops and I love them all. I am known for telling it like it is - good or bad. I tell you it is GOOD!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  We love having you & Sully part of the Oak View family!

name: Kara Haddock
text: Dr. Robinson is very sweet and caring and she truly cares about your pets well being. Front desk staff are always friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Oak View!

resp.text: Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!

name: Shana Moton
text: My husband and I have been taking our sweet pups to Oak View Animal Hospital for the past three years.  We completely trust their care to Dr. Price and Robinson, and staff.  Not only do they love on our animals, but we have always been treated with the highest respect and sweetness each time we're there.

name: Kelly Ezell
text: Dr. Bradac, Julie, Lee and the rest of the team at Oak View have given my Tebow the best of care for the past 4 years.  Thank you all for your compassion for both my beloved pet and for me.

resp.text: Kelly - Thank you!  We are grateful you shared your thoughts to recommend us to other pet owners.  We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital!

name: Freeman White
text: Great customer service, very friendly and great groom job on my dog

name: Yvonne Waldon
text:
Oak View Animal Hospital, Dr. Robinson, Dr. Price and their staff are the best!!
They are warm and friendly.  You will not find more concern or better care for your
pet's needs anywhere.  Without a doubt, they are "TOPS"!!!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: Drs. Price and Robinson are great.  My dogs and cats have been seeing them for years.  Not only do I appreciate their professional work they are very compassionate towards the pets as well.  Also, their entire staff is wonderful, so friendly and truly interested in your pet.

name: Joseph Gay
text: A great group of people that really cares about your pet and you. My dog would have died if it hadn't been for them agreeing to seeing him on a Saturday as a walk-in. Most of the other area Vets were closed or I was told they just see their regular clients on Saturdays. It has been 4 years since that date, my dog is doing fine and he loves going to see the staff at Oak View Animal Hospital. My parents use them them as well and we always board our pets with them when we go out of town. Ms. Renee is always a pleasure to talk to, she the first person you see coming through the door. She remembers you and your pets names. You dont have to tell her who you are when you come in. Great People and God Bless you all.

name: Jill Graham
text: We love Oak View. Dr. Robinson and Dr. Bradac are both so kind and always take time to call and check on our pups after visits. All of the staff that we have interacted with are great!

resp.text: Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners. We appreciate you  sharing your thoughts on Dr. Robinson, Dr. Bradac & Oak View!

name: Nicholle Brendlinger
text: Dr. Robinson knowledge and competence inspires confidence always, but her exceptional kindness, compassion and support during less than optimal circumstances truly make her stand out as an exceptional veterinarian. We are blessed to have her.

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Dr. Robinson and Oak View!

name: Sara Downs
text: We just recently moved to Pelham and Oak View Animal Hospital is at the end of our neighbor hood! We took one of our two dogs there for her yearly check up and everyone from the front desk to the vet assistant to the doctor were great and very friendly. We loved the Dr. Robinson, she was very nice, took time with us and answered all the questions that we had. One weekend we had my brother in law's dog with us and noticed that he had a couple of fleas and called them on Saturday morning and asked if there was anyway that we could come and get a flea pill for him even though he has never been seen there before and she said of course and was very helpful!! I would recommend them to everyone!!

name: Deirdre Morgan
text: Oak View has taken care of my furry children for almost 16 years; starting with our lovely lady of a dachshund, Lucy; whom we lost to the "Rainbow Bridge" a long time ago, through our grumpy lady, Callie, the tortoise shell cat, who was never pleasant to them, and on to our current pair of feline girls who they take very good care of.  A little over two months ago, we had to make the difficult decision to let Callie go.  The vets and staff at Oak View were very supportive to Callie and us and we could not have asked for better people to be with us at a very difficult time.  I will never forget what they did for us then and what they continue to do.  Blessings to everyone there.

name: Darla Spinosi
text: This place is great!  It's located at the edge of a residential section of Pelham, it's been there as long as I can remember.  They've been around for a long time for good reason.  They really care.  The doctor always calls me after to check on my pet's recovery.  And recover they do!  These people have saved my pets more than a few times.  And their fees are quite reasonable.  I will never change vet clinics!

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family all these years! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Steve Hutto
text: I've been taking my dogs here for 3 years. I had to euthanize 2 of my Jack Russell's here and the staff was amazing. Very respectful and sympathetic. They now take care of our 1 yr old Labradoodle for grooming and shots. Wouldn't take her anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate you being a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family and recommending us to other Pelham pet owners.

name: Annmarie Burch
text: I have used Oak View since 2006. My dogs love it there. The staff makes you feel so comfortable. I am emotionally attached to my kids well dogs. My baby girl Missy is getting older now going blind and i dropped her off for a grooming. My baby had a seisure they called me immediately just asked if i was still close by. I was. When i got there they told me what happened. I fell over crying. The staff sat with me watched my baby girl called the next day to check on her. This place is amazing.

resp.text: We treat patients like our own pets and worried about Missy.  Our doctors & staff are so glad to have you a part of the Oak View Animal Hospital family!

name: W Price
text: This place has been our vet for years.  Always easy to get an appt; friendly staff; great pet care.  Dr. Robinson is great.

resp.text: We appreciate you being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts on Dr. Robinson & Oak View!

name: Halie Lindsey
text: If I could give a higher rating a definitely would! The Doctors and staff are amazing and my kitten and I went home very happy! We have definitely found our new vet!

name: j w

name: Whitney Gay
text: Dr. Robinson, Dr. Price and all of the staff at Oak View are amazing. We started our dog's care here right after we adopted her from the humane society. We loved how she was treated and how we were treated. After that we transferred our cat's care here, because we were not satisfied with our other vet and had had such a good experience with Oak View. They treated our cat's chronic and severe UTI and he hasn't had one in 2 years; where as at the other vet we felt like he was not being fully treated and was having unnecessary testing for his diagnosis. In Sept. 2013 we noticed that our dog was not acting like herself and it was after hours, so we took her to the ER vet and they misdiagnosed her with gastritis. We took her to Dr. Price the next day because she had gotten severely worse. Within minutes he diagnosed her with an IMHA, which is a very serious, usually fatal, diagnosis. He sat down with me and explained the disease and treatment course. He stayed with her through the night while she received a blood transfusion, to ensure that she didn't have a reaction to it. He even called me late that night to give me an update. Now nine months later she is her perky self. I would never trust my pets to anybody but Oak View! They are so compassionate, caring and knowledgeable. You won't find a better vet in the Birmingham area!

In all my years of owning animals, I had also never had a vet who gave you their personal contact information and never hesitated to answer right away! The rest of the people at the clinic are wonderful as well and Renee is always such a joy to see when you come in. We can't imagine ever using another clinic and I would follow Dr Price anywhere he moved his practice!

text: Actually, maybe a .5 star. Oakview Animal Hospital told me I could adopt a perfectly adorable labradoodle, whom I'd begun loving the moment we met. I'd planned to pick him up the next day. OAH ought to really consider their bedside manner. I know OAH originally wanted this dog to be adopted with his buddy, and that's why they gave them both to someone else. But promising me the dog, who ran to me and put his head in my lap upon meeting, and then giving him to someone else is bloody rotten. I pulled all of my current dog's records from OAH and I will  never go back.

name: Tyler Robbins
text:
My story does not have a happy ending but I thank everyone at Oak View Animal Hospital for making the journey an amazing adventure.

I adopted Max from the Birmingham Humane Society. A year old border collie mix of some sort, who knows? I did my research looking for a vet and asked my friends who they recommended. Oak View came up multiple times so eventually i decided Oak View would be Max and mine's vet. I could not have been happier with the choice. They helped me take my firsts steps as friend and pet owner and made both of us feel like we were part of the family.

Max didn't have his first seizure until 3 months after i adopted him. Oak View walked me through the different reasons a dog can have a seizure and laid out a plan to help moderate or even eliminate Max's seizures. Had Max's condition been epilepsy or even one of the many normal conditions that can cause seizures i can honestly say Oak View would have been able to help him. Through the empirical method we tried everything to help Max. Unfortunately Max's grand mal seizures persisted and i lost a piece of my friend after each one. Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson admitted that this may be beyond their scope and I respect them all the more for it. I took Max to Neurologists, pathologists, and almost every specialist at Auburn and in between. No one could put a finger on it.

Within a year my friend was no longer himself. Oak View helped with his final moments and the level of caring and comfort they provided i will never forget. Thank you Oak View. I can never thank you enough for the love and support you gave Max and me.

If you are debating what Vet to use i highly recommend Oak View.

resp.text: Our sympathies on your loss - you worked hard to help him with his seizures and issues.  Our doctors and staff wished we could have helped Max and provided you with more time with him.  Thank you for working with us and other specialists to try to diagnose his conditions.  We wish the outcome was better for you and him.  Thank you for trusting us and allowing us to care for him.  If you do adopt again, we look forward to having you part of the Oak View family.

name: Steve Dalby
text: Took them four (4) days to fill my prescription

resp.text: Hello Steve, Thank you for reaching out to us. 4 days is far too long if this is a regular manufactured prescription. However, you may have gotten a compounded medication from us. May I ask if this prescription was a compound? If this was a compounded medication, we should have let you know that compounds will take at least 2 working days to make. This 2 day delay is because of the time it takes to hand make a compounded medication. Also, we are not open on the weekends, so these 2 working days may be stretched to be 4 actual days before you can pick up your compounded medication. Compounding is a very labor intensive and precise task that cannot be rushed if we are going to produce a quality medication to the exact specifications of your prescribing physician. I apologize if we failed to mention this delay when you came to fill with us. I would like to make things right by offering a $50 store credit to apply to any future purchase with us. Please call the pharmacy and ask for me. I would love to speak with you about resolving this issue. ~ Jeffrey (Owner, Pure Life Pharmacy)

Wonderful pharmacy with very helpful staff!

resp.text: Leslie, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We have been mailing out for a long time and we are good at it. Delivery and mail options are an important part of a pharmacies services. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review.

name: Ray Reynolds
text: Great products. Friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you Ray. Being friendly is an important part of our pharmacy. Thank you for taking the time to write a review for us.

name: Fred Peace II
text: My mother suffers from rheumatoid arthritis. Due to her pain gradually increasing she has been unable to completely close her hands for the last several years and dropping small objects the last several months. The Pharmacist asked us several questions and suggested a topical product they sell in the store over the counter. Shortly after applying the product mom started bending her fingers and she clenched her fist and started crying because it did not hurt. I realized the Pharmacist teared up when she saw this happen. I cannot express my gratitude and appreciation for the Pharmacist’s insight and the effort they they gave in making this new medication possible. I can only give them my sincerest thank you. Thank you for making this possible and thank you for helping us.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing that story Fred. We hope your mother had continued success with our over the counter cream. Listening to patients is the key to being able to help. It's wonderful that it all worked out. Thank you again for taking the time to write your review.

name: Desiree Smith
text: I was sent here to pick up a prescription by my physician. I called about my prescription since I heard nothing from them about it. The person I spoke to you as not knowledgeable at all about my medication and when I asked for someone who could tell me more about it the lady was not much help either. Most pharmacists or technicians will answer any questions you may have in great detail. I just did not feel good about my experience here.

resp.text: Hello Desiree, thank you for taking the time and letting us know about this issue. We apologize you had a unsatisfactory experience with us and we took your comment to heart. We had an internal meeting to discuss how this could have happened. We have some ideas of how this could have happened and we would like to talk to you directly about your experience. We have always prided ourself on our knowledge and experience, so this comment hit home. We have 3 very special pharmacists at Pure Life Pharmacy; Alyna, Joanna, and Hayley have over 45 years of combined pharmacy experience. These three are dedicated to answering patient questions correctly. If you check these messages we would love to discuss your experience off-line. Please call us. We would be happy to discuss the issue when ever you have a moment.

name: Linsey Lees
text: Their staff has amazing knowledge and customer service. It is refreshing to know without insurance I can obtain a prescription at a more affordable cost than with insurance. Great place. They are the best!

resp.text: You're the best Linsey! Thank you for taking the time to leave a wonderful review.

name: Gail Forster
text: They are always super sweet and efficient! Always got a smile on their faces!

resp.text: Thank you Gail, we smile because we love helping others!

name: Kathryn Graham
text: The staff is always friendly and very accomodating. There is NEVER a wait of more than 15 minutes unless you have to have something compounded and then your wait is under 30 minutes. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE Pure Life Pharmacy. Dont let the fact that they dont accept insurance scare you away. The medication here is exactly the same as prescribed and much, much cheaper even without insurance.

resp.text: And we love you too Kathryn! Thank you for mentioning that we skip insurance and its nothing to be afraid of. Skipping insurance allows us to set our own prices and save you money. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

name: Teresa Cartee
text: They are absolutely great. They truly care and do everything in their ability to help you. I would recommend them to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you Teresa, we think you are absolutely great. Thank you for taking the time to write a wonderful review.

name: God's Servant
text: Excellent Service. A+

resp.text: We have A+ patients!

name: Francis Springer
text: Great people to work with. Made delivery to Fort Morgan for our convenience.

resp.text: Thank you Francis. Deliveries have always been important to us. We are glad we were able to help you receive your medication conveniently. Thank you again for taking the time to write your review.

name: D.J. LEES
text: What a great team! Always patient first and always the best price!

resp.text: What a great review DJ! Thank you!

name: James Walker
text: Wonderful Vets and great staff!  We have always had a fun and pleasurable experience!

name: Pamela Martin
text: Love this place! They are an All animal hospital that come to my house to administer my dogs' vaccinations. Max loved the treatment and atmosphere of the hospital on Capshaw. He had an ear hematoma that they drained without any problems. Max is an older canine that I took to an Equine hospital in our home town, so he the atmosphere around the horses is perfect for him.

name: Tricia Engels
text: Drivers are irresponsible and erratic the old woman that answers is rude and unprofessional would highly recommend someone else

name: David Guido
text: Brought the boys in (2x 🐎) for their yearly exam and check up. Short wait but great service , very thorough visit and background exam.  The Vet spent time with us and answered all questions. Certainly gets our recommendation.

name: Ambur Love
text: I take my dog here, and I love the it! The workers are sweet and down to earth. The vet for the smaller animals explains everything very well, and I feel like I can trust him. I'm glad I found them as my new vet.

text: Dr. Dunlap and his staff are outstanding. No matter whether it is a wellness visit at the clinic or he has to come to your place for a problem, you can count on him to provide excellent care for your horse and he is great with us humans too. Lucky to have him!

name: Jana Russell Nails
text: I love the folks here. Dr Harney and Dr Dunlap are knowledgeable and friendly; their assistants are helpful and personable too. Whether they're coming out to my ranch or seeing my animals at their facility I can always count on them to take care of my furry babies.  They see small animals too!

name: Gayle Barnett
text: Dr Dunlap has been my horse vet for about 8 years. He and his staff have provided routine and emergency services for us, and they are always professional, knowledgable and compassionate. I feel like my horses will get excellent veterinary care and they also take the time to be sure that I understand and am comfortable with the recommended treatments.

name: Ourania Murphy
text: Excellent practice

name: Donna Love
text: Great place and great people

name: Marie Lyons

text: I was so pleased by the clinic! I called to ask about some symptoms my dog was having and they were able to see him right away. The team were very friendly and professional yet you could see their compassion for animals. I am happy we chose them as our service provider!

When I went there my pupdog had chewed all the fur off her butt and back and everywhere. Maybe 3 weeks after the visit my pupdog looks WAYYYY more healthy!! Thank you everyone there! God bless y'all!

P.s I MEAN LOOK AT THIS SMILING PUPDOG AND TELL ME SHE DOESN'T FEEL BETTER! HAHAHA

She spoke to me like a person and not just another number. She truly cared for my baby. I will definitely recommend Helena Vet to all of my friends from now on!!!

text: Everyone was great! Very friendly  staff.  Loved Dr Barnette.  She went out of her way to explain every aspect of care and treatment. Office atmosphere was very cheerful and helpful. Prices were fair. Good location. Will be back!

My dog and I have had nothing but excellent experiences and wonderful care from Helena Vet Clinic. ❤️

name: Liz Jarrell
text: I moved here from Kentucky I have 12 year old lab name Lukey they were so great with him and me. They explain everything with you and you have questions they are there to help. Now my little ole man has cancer and they have been wonderful if I have question or concerns after hours they would respond. Luke and I so blessed for have them in our lives.i highly recommend the staff and doctors. We love you all.

text: I’ve had my golden doodle puppy Mosby in there for his 3rd and 4th rounds of shots and it has been a great experience. Efficient, friendly, helpful, and affordable.

name: Alexa Hargreave
text:
We absolutely LOVE Helena Vet Clinic. Our young cats have had several visits in the last year. Two of the visits were for serious issues. We have only had Dr. Stephens as our doctor the times we've been there. Dr. Stephens is incredible.
How he communicates, and truly loves our babies is priceless. Also, very professional and informative. Reception is always very kind, and patient. These folks truly love our fur babies.

text: They have been great both times I have taken my pittie in.  Janet gets us right in on the days I request. They will take great care of your babies. Highly recommend.

name: Susann McWhorter
text: Doctors and staff are TRULY animal lovers! Each person shows compassionate patience with my dog. All are very professional and pleasant! Have used this clinic for years and wouldn’t consider any other!

name: Jenna
text:
Wow! I came here for the first time today with my senior dog. We decided to change vets since we moved to the area. The receptionist, vet tech, and vet were WONDERFUL. I have never been to a place where they showed this much care, patience, and attention to my pet.
The staff is young, but don't let that throw you off. Your fur baby will be very much cared for here. I will absolutely be making this my go-to place.

name: Allison Dunbar
text: The staff was amazing! My dog was injured by another dog and needed to have her jaw wired back together as well at stitches and other treatment. Janet kept me informed throughout the whole process and I rested well knowing Dixie was in good hands! They got her fixed up and she is back home resting well.

name: Anna Jacobs
text: The doctors here are really knowledgeable and caring. It’s obvious they are passionate about taking care of patients. I never feel like I’m being overcharged, and I feel safe bringing my pets here. The reception staff is always incredibly friendly! I think it’s amazing the steps they’re taking to keep themselves and the general public safe by abiding by COVID—19 restrictions and keeping it to curbside service only. Thank you so much for all you guys do!

name: Chad 395
text: Best experience I’ve had at a vet clinic. Making an appointment was quick and easy. The staff was extremely kind and ensured all of my questions and were answered and my pup’s visit was explained thoroughly. Dr Allison was great. Very happy I chose this clinic for my new puppy!

name: MichelleJosesph Booth
text: They called me Scott for some reason I think they have me mixed up with somebody else! My name is Joseph and they did a great job with Saban  our dog. Pretty sure they’re going to remain our vet. The vet was very personable and professional and told us everything she did.

name: Deanna Chandler
text: Dr. Barrett is fantastic! She was super tentative and was extremely thorough. She answered all my questions happily

name: April Mason
text: I have been taking all my fur babies to Helena Vet. Clinic for a good long while.  They treat me and my babies like we are one of their families.  I can't say enough about this place.

name: dustin Norris
text: I have used this clinic for over 20 years and always been extremely pleased with my service and care...to me and my pets. Excellent place to take your fur babies and Excellent people taking care of them.

name: Angel Gilly
text: Polite, professional, knowledgeable, and caring staff provided excellent treatment for my cat Archie Waffles while calming me and thoroughly explaining what was happening and what could and should happen in the future. Highly recommend.

name: Tracey Bowen
text: I brought two of my dogs for nail trims and check a hot spot on the tail of my other dog. The doctors and techs are wonderful! However my one dog, avalanche, had two toes that were bleeding from his nail trim. I’m hoping the medicine I was given for my other dog, Keelin, for her alopecia works for her tail.

name: Marc and Karen Werner
text: We have boarded both of our dogs and most recently had them groomed and their semi annual check ups. 1 of our 2 cats that we rescued was showing symptoms of what we thought was allergies, but turned out to be a virus that was quickly found and treated within only a few minutes. The vet called us and explained everything in detail and answered all the questions that we had about treatment of both cats (since they were rescued together). Pricing is extremely fair and the staff is great!

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Very happy to find a veterinarian near our home in Helena that is professional, responsive, and good with our fur babies.

name: Kevin Stober
text: All the people at Helena Veterinary Clinic are professional, friendly, and caring about animals. It's very easy to get an appointment and their hours make it possible to drop off and pick up even if you have a busy work schedule. Their prices are very fair for the quality of service for your pet. They are my go to place for my dog (Coco)!

name: Amanda Counts
text: We changed vets after over 25 years and came to Helena Vet. The office manager helped me with getting out 3 dogs records from our previous vet and arranged our pets visits. During the vet visit the Doctor was on the phone with me the entire time (during COVID) - explained everything including the cost for each test and medication. She answered all of my questions honestly and was great to explain everything. My dog suffers from allergies and previously we were not taken very seriously and told to give large doses of Benadryl even though I explained that does not work for her anymore- it never really did. The most vital part was that she helped me with a treatment plan for my dog. At the end of the visit #1 I was not surprised by the bill- she discussed all that with me as we spoke and #2 I knew the all of the next steps. That was a big deal because where we were before I never had a treatment plan and basically we started over every time we came in. The next day Lucy’s skin was not red, hot, and irritated, she wasn’t chewing on her paws and shaking her head, she wasn’t panting and stressing her and everyone around her out. she was relaxed and calm, and sleeping so peacefully- that hasn’t happened in 8 years for her. The doctor even called me back to go over all of her blood work results. I have never been more impressed with a veterinarian clinic. I am actually a little embarrassed that I continued taking my dogs to the previous vet all these years- had I known the level of service that we were missing and the expertise these doctors offer in comparison to what we had grown accustomed to, I would have moved them many years ago. I look forward to many years of quality care for my dogs.

name: Kay Guess
text: Dr. Barnett and the staff at Helena Veterinary Clinic are always so easy to work with and have such compassion for the animals they care for. They explain everything fully, and you leave knowing exactly how to take care of your pet when you get home. Very thankful to have them in Helena!

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.

text: The entire staff is extremely professional and caring. My dog loves going there and I highly recommend them.

name: Samuel Monte

text: The veterinarian is always very professional and always lets me know any details about my pets visits. The staff there are super kind, would highly recommend others to go to this veterinarian.

I could not be more thankful for this clinic and its amazing, caring and professional staff. I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a vet for their sweet fur baby. They took care of our Marlin like their own, made sure to keep us updated through the whole process, gave us specific directions for his aftercare and he is now at home healing nicely. We are SO THANKFUL for Helena Vet Clinic and its staff for being so wonderful through this process. You can tell they are all dedicated to making sure all the fur babies are well taken care of!

name: Kelly Benton
text: Everyone was very kind! Doctor Stephens was also very patient with all of my questions and very specific and detailed when he gave me information. I am a new dog owner and had a lot of questions I needed answered for my Doodle Puppy! I also very much like that they will communicate with me via Text Message about whatever I need! Love this place!

name: Chris Parton
text: This is a great clinic! The docs and staff are caring and patient. They have done a great job of adapting to the times during Covid.  Highly recommend!

name: Ashlee Elliott
text: Helena Vet Clinic is above the rest. They have cared for our best buddy since he was 8 weeks old. He is now 7 and has a tremendous amount of allergy issues. They have always been very responsive to his issues, even referring him to a speciality vet when they knew he needed specialized skin treatment. To me that speaks volumes of their professionalism. Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barrett are amazing, as well as Erin and Janet. These are the staff members we interact with most, but every single person we’ve ever encountered there has been like family! We can’t thank them enough for everything they’ve done for caring and treating our Apollo!

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Stacey Simpson
text: Everyone at Helena Veterinary has just been the best.  We have lived here going on 6 years and have had 5 different pets (4 dogs and a cat) under their care. Barnett and Stephens always answer all of our questions, and I've known Karen for as long as we've been using Helena Vet.  She is just so patient and kind and helpful, no matter what is going on.  Janet also has a real heart for animal care and has patiently answered my recent questions about my sweet older dog.  And talk about responsive, they will work with you in any way they can for appointments, medication, whatever the need is. Always return calls. Just can't say enough good things about all of these folks!

name: Pam Malone

The nicest of people work there. It seems like they really like their jobs!

For covid: You call if you have when you get there if you have an appointment.

I honestly could not imagine taking my baby anywhere else. I moved about an hour away and refuse to go anywhere else.  Any time we need something, they are so quick to respond or get us in.

Both Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barnett always know what my pup needs and they get her fixed up! The whole staff from Janet to Karen and too many more to name, they are the literal best!!

My pup was fine when returned to me and is up to date on vaccines so I suppose it's okay.

text: The clinic manager was excellent! Dr. Stephens took so much good care of our little fur baby. I’m happy to drive from Hoover to Helena for Dr. Stephens and his clinic!!!

I couldn't be more grateful for having the opportunity to work with such an amazing caring staff from the Hospital Manager Janet being so kind and transparent with us to Dr. Stephens dedicating his after hours time and personally calling us after the surgery to let us know how Chief was doing. Needless to say I would recommend HVC for anyone seeking any care for their beloved pets. I am forever grateful for this Clinic and I can guarantee you it is where my Family and I will be seeking out our pet care!

Their knowledge in this career is outstanding and I will always go with whatever recommendations they have for our fur family! Would highly recommend! Thanks to the team for becoming a part of our fur family!!!

name: Tyler Elsberry
text: Everyone was so friendly from the moment we stepped into the office until we left!! As a new pet owner, it really gave me reassurance that my pet will be in great hands. This will be my new permanent vet clinic and I will refer everyone I know around the area!

name: J. Terry McCombs

We have been thru joy and hard loss with this team, and they have been nothing short of family.   You will never regret making Helena Vet Clinic your vet of choice.

name: Eddie Reyes
text: Staff was super helpful and professional. I was in and out. My two girls are doing a whole lot better and I'm extremely thankful for their expertise!

text:

resp.text: Shannon We are thankful you are part of Helena Veterinary Clinic!  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and for the kind words.  We appreciate the recommendation to other pet owners!

text:

Dr. Wes Stephens is beyond amazing. 😸
He looks at his fur patients as if they were his very own pets. He does everything he can and does not do like most and automatically say, "put the 😐 animal down" 😔 NO, he is about helping the animals and making sure that they are able to live a long happy healthy life! 🤗 He explains everything at an easy way to understand. He takes one day at a time with them, meaning he doesn't throw everything out all at once; he tries to make sure the animals are very comfortable and at ease. He's a great doctor and I am very confident & very happy to say that he is the best Veterinary Doctor that I have ever EVER dealt with. And I am extremely comfortable leaving my fur kids in his care. I trust all his work and his intentions and opinions. 💯

Dr. Wes Stephens helped to save my fur kid's life and I couldn't be more blessed for Dr. Stephens & his work. He knows exactly what he is doing & what is best for these babies. He will not steer you wrong & he is also very very blunt, meaning, he's not gonna lie to you just because it's something he knows you don't wanna hear. He's gonna tell you rather you like the news or not because your fur babies lives are in his hands and he wants them to be able live long happy healthy lives so he has no choice But to be truthfully blunt. I would rather be faced with the bad news and my fur kid receive the help he/she needs than to be Lord lied to about his/her situation and than my baby die or become worse..

Dr. Wes Stephens is the way to go!

name: Devon Bissot
text:
This weekend I brought in a 1-year-old weim mix for a simple nail trimming. They brought it to my attention that he was not being cooperative and would need to be sedated. We passed on this at the moment to discuss the $150 fee they were asking.

They did let me know they were able to get his back paws trimmed. Upon returning home, we found that they completely broke one of our dog's back nails. Not just broke, but practically tore it out of the nail bed. It's sitting 90 degrees from where it's supposed to be.

It doesn't take a genius to think this through...if this was the first nail they tried to cut...then of course he acted out the rest of the time. He was hurt!

If it was the last nail they tried to cut and he had been acting so bad to begin with, why didn't they stop?

And...you're telling me you didn't know you hurt him that badly??? How can this happen and you not see it?

Today, he is at another vet who was able to examine him without any sort of sedation. The nail that was injured by Helena Veterinary Clinic will now cost me $200 to fix.

Helena Veterinary Clinic's response to this...it's my fault. I should have practiced with him daily to get him used to having his nails trimmed. The most ignorant comment ever made.

name: Kacey Hydrick
text: You can tell a lot about the character of the doctors and the people who work in an office by the way they react to an emergency situation. We had an emergency with our elderly dog today and when we called the office, they were not compassionate and seemed bothered by the fact we were having an emergency. I don't expect anyone to stop everything when something happens to one of my animals but when an animal is very old and becomes short of breath and semi responsive, you'd at least think the vet office that you call would at least sound like they care even if they don't. In a brief phone call, it was obvious that the person who answered was not concerned, sympathetic, or compassionate. Luckily, there is another office that we were able to contact, be seen, and send our sweet angel to Heaven within an hour. She was almost gone when we called your office and were told you could see us in about 2 hours like it was just some routine vet visit. I hope that the next time an emergency happens and someone needs help from you in an emergency situation that you'll at least pretend to care even if you don't.

name: Rod Riv
text: Ask around. The neighbors tell us that this clinic refused to issue paper prescriptions in order to force you into using their online pharmacy so they can get a kickback. They wouldn't give me a paper prescription either. Their bitter front desk attendent Debra hates men and tosses around the word liar on a whim. Call three times to set up an appt, and they will clip the nails and claim you never asked to see the vet, but charge for boarding. Will run an exhaustive list of tests and generate a 2000.00 balance when those tests are not justified by the prognosis or diagnosis. Other vets claim they can't follow the thought pattern and charts were poorly documented suggesting tests were run to make use of expensive equipment for a return on investment. The crates are kept behind closed doors because the conditions are terrible. They over-medicated my dog by giving her a 3 year shot twice just so they could charge for it. You'll notice Debra pushing those heavily. Same as companion... Same vets...same staff... Stay away. Be warned or you are sure to experience one of these terrible experiences. All this in just two visits.

name: Trina Barrett
text: I don’t do reviews often. Dr. Farmer is a wonderful vet and I have used him for years. However recently we saw Dr. Bearden. I cannot recommend her under any circumstances. My dog had an obvious deformation in her leg after an accident. Dr. Bearden put her in a splint, took X-rays and told us she would send them to a surgeon. Each week we went back and the treatment plan/diagnosis/story changed. The staff would tell me something different than she did each time. She never sent the X-rays to a surgeon. 6 weeks this went on. (Shame on me for letting it go on so long) On the last visit the dog was dropped off 7am, at her request, for observation without the splint. She didn’t look at the dog or remove the splint until I called at 1:30 for an update. At 3:30 she claimed the dog only had “liganitis” but was still not putting weight on the leg. When I asked about the “dent” she claimed I had never told her about it. Not true, and it was easy to see on the dog’s leg. She wanted to give the dog back without a splint. I had the staff splint the leg and took the dog to another vet. She had to have a metal plate surgically implanted to fix the damage. Because of Dr Bearden’s poor diagnostic skills, I cannot recommend PC Animal Hospital unless you see Dr. Farmer.

I've had my Yorkshire Terrier groomed there and have always been pleased at how well they take care of him and the job they've done.

text: I moved an hour away from my old vet. I loved them and had continued using them but if you've ever traveled with a dog with a terribly upset stomach, you know the need to find someone closer.   So glad we found this place.
